name: Beak to Beak Delivery Co.
description:
In Beak to Beak Delivery Co. you explore a vast ocean delivering letters and packages to improve your ship and dominate the ocean.  Have fun exploring islands, fishing, and battling against pirates.

This game is on its early stage. Any feedback is appreciated :D

Feel free to follow the game for the following updates!

Controls:

  • WASD and mouse for movement
  • E for interactions
  • M for map
  • Mouse right/left click for shooting cannonballs
  • Mouse left click for fishing
